entries.journal_entry_completion_summary: You found the motivator amid a pile of wreckage. It still seems to be operable. Watto will hold it until you have all the parts to rebuild the droid.
entries.journal_entry_description: Watto has told you a strange story about some crazy human that thought he could run the Boonta Eve Classic pod racer track years after its closure. He was warned about all the damage and buildings that have cropped up, but he tried it regardless. He thought his special droid could calculate the course ahead of his manuevering, but apparently it couldn't. He crashed and died. The droid he was using has the motivator you are looking for. It's possible it's still there.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: Watto thinks the motivator was sold to a Twi'lek pod racer that goes by the name An'Kwee.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Take care of the races Draknus will have you run and then return to An'Kwee.
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: You have proven yourself as a racer. Talk to An'Kwee about the droid motivator.
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: An'Kwee has given you the location of the wrecked pod racer. The motivator may still be there. Go check it out and see if it's still there.
entries.task04_journal_entry_description: Bring Watto the motivator and the extra salvage you found.
entries.task05_journal_entry_description: Good Work! You have completed the Pod Retrieval quest.
